page.title: 17Cobham Fete
page.content: There is a fete held on the recreation ground every year on August bank holiday Monday.There is always a sign put on the school fence to let people know what day and what time.All the village help to get things ready,and Mr.Jackson the farmer,comes around with his truck to collect things which people give away,also the bundles of straw which are needed for the games. There are lots of things to do and lots of things to buy,also raffles to be won.It is normally a hot day and the field is packed with people from the nearby towns.There are coco-nut shies and many game stalls.
